lines.text: I didn't know you had any dealing with the Indians.
You still don't know. That's what I pay you for...not to know anything.
What is it, Tom? Are you selling the Apaches whiskey or guns?
You better put that blindfold back on.
It's no wonder you got so many gunslingers working for you.
You know, you'd look a lot healthier with that usual dumb look on your face.
Tom, I can only go so far with that dumb look and then something gets stuck in my craw and I can't get it out.
[Dan offers the Sheriff part of a bribe]
Mr. Grover, hadn't you better take some of this?
A man can't live without money.
I'll you something, son. When it's that kind of money, a man can't live with it.
